#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define gc getchar_unlocked

inline long long in() {
	char c=gc();
	while(c<'0' || c>'9')
		c=gc();
	long long num=0;
	while(c>='0' && c<='9') {
		num=10*num+c-48;
		c=gc();
	}
	return num;
}

main() {
	long long T;
	T=in();
	while(T--) {
		long long a,b,tmp;
		a=in(); b=in();
		if((a+b)%5!=0)
			printf("-1\n");
		else {
			tmp=abs((2*(a+b))/5-a);
			printf("%lld\n",tmp);
		}
	}
}
